text: Stundin is an Icelandic bi-weekly newspaper. It was founded in 2015 by former staff of DV after a hostile takeover of the paper. It was funded through the Karolina Fund platform and reached its goal of five million Icelandic Kronas in two days. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2015 establishments in Iceland Category:Publications established in 2015 Category:Newspapers published in Iceland
title: Stundin
